title: Do you use any aid like Grammarly to write? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, I don’t. So I can’t comment on whether Grammarly is any good. I haven’t used Microsoft’s grammar check for years because it objected to sentences in the passive voice and sentences with multiple sub-clauses, both of which are necessary in academic and scientific writing. It may have improved since I last tried it. I was taught grammar at school and grew up writing by hand and then with a typewriter; I only started using a computer for writing when doing my university undergraduate degree dissertation. I do use a spellchecker and have set it up so that it will automatically correct words I habitually get wrong.
